skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn and two 5% [Poison] debuffs for 2 turns. 

[Passive Effect]

Places two additional 5% [Poison] debuffs for 2 turns whenever a [Sleep] debuff placed by this skill is removed or disappears after an enemy takes damage.
